alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 11 at 5:11AM PDT until October 11 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West to northewst winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 45 to to 50 mph expected. There will be local gusts to 55 mph in the western foothills. * WHERE...Western Antelope Valley Foothills, Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Patchy blowing dust and sand could reduce visibilities sharply at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Patchy blowing dust and sand could reduce visibilities sharply are times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. &&

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
